content.question: Which of the following observations would provide evidence of a positive feedback mechanism in this system?

choices.label: Estrogen from the ovaries inhibits the release of <math alttext="G n R H" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>GnRH</mtext></mrow></math> from the hypothalamus.
Progesterone from the ovaries stimulates the thickening of the uterine lining.

Progesterone from the ovaries inhibits the release of <math alttext="L H" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>LH</mtext></mrow></math> and <math alttext="F S H" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>FSH</mtext></mrow></math> from the anterior pituitary.

Estrogen from the ovaries stimulates the hypothalamus and anterior pituitary to secrete more <math alttext="G n R H" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>GnRH</mtext></mrow></math>, <math alttext="L H" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>LH</mtext></mrow></math>, and <math alttext="F S H" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>FSH</mtext></mrow></math>.

content.answer: Estrogen from the ovaries stimulates the hypothalamus and anterior pituitary to secrete more <math alttext="G n R H" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>GnRH</mtext></mrow></math>, <math alttext="L H" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>LH</mtext></mrow></math>, and <math alttext="F S H" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>FSH</mtext></mrow></math>.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain how biological models relate to larger principles, concepts, processes, systems, or theories.
